snippet: Torii Hunter joins Prince Fielder and Miguel Cabrera in the lineup for Detroit, which fell short in the World Series.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Detroit Tigers sign outfielder Torii Hunter to a two-year, $26 million contract; other MLB developments noted.
lead_paragraph: Torii Hunter joins Prince Fielder and Miguel Cabrera in the lineup for Detroit, which fell short in the World Series.

headline.main: Tigers Add a Big Bat by Signing Hunter
headline.print_headline: Tigers Add A Big Bat By Signing Hunter
